review: I bought this instead of the Chromecast stick because it said it had 2x the capacity, etc. However, it doesn't allow me to add movies to the 2x capacity sized stick,  so it's somewhat of a let down. Plus, several if the preset apps on the stick do not work. Wish i would have stuck w the Chomestick
author: MaryLee Huerta

review: It's good but it keeps loosing connectivity every an hour so.
author: Tomi

review: I absolutely LOVE it.  I even cancelled the premium channels on my satellite TV.  I find that I watch more on the Fire Stick than on my regular TV.  Especially since everything is on hiatus for the Summer.
author: La

review: THIS is SUPER Cool. I CAN Watch anything. Daily shows to the live news. Even old ass movies, as well as New ones that I love!way way better than Netflix...
author: sunny

review: I love it!!! Use it everyday. Wish this was out before I bought Chromecast. Great functionality
author: Teameargasm

review: It was extremely easy to use and I have little tech experience. Thank you for the support and recommendation from customer service to purchase this device.  Prime needs a few more classic movies to rent.
author: KristineJ

review: It has a quick& easy setup!
author: elizabeth jones

review: A bit upsurd to offer amazon videos to all your prime customers worldwide and yet when we try to access it we are blocked out due to geographical reasons. Way to go amazon!
author: OB1
